pages.text: The $(blood)Sanguine Diviner$() is an essential tool for any blood mage seeking to construct or upgrade their Blood Altar. It reveals the hidden structure required for each altar tier, making construction far less error-prone.$(br2)This mystical tool bridges the gap between vision and reality, showing you exactly where each component must be placed.

The Sanguine Diviner has three primary functions:$(br)$(li)$(blood)Divine Structure:$() Right-click an altar to see which blocks are missing$(li)$(blood)Ghost Blocks:$() Sneak + right-click to place phantom blocks showing the required structure$(li)$(blood)Auto-Build:$() While ghost blocks are visible, right-click with the required blocks to place them automatically

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)Divining an Altar:$()$(br)Right-click your Blood Altar with the Sanguine Diviner. It will display:$(br)$(li)Current tier$(li)Blood capacity$(li)Missing components in chat$(br2)$(bold)Viewing Ghost Blocks:$()$(br)Sneak + right-click the altar to see wireframe ghost blocks showing where each component needs to be placed for the next tier upgrade.

pages.title: Auto-Placement
pages.text: When ghost blocks are visible, you can use the diviner for assisted building:$(br)$(li)Hold the required block type in your hand$(li)Right-click while looking at the altar$(li)The diviner will automatically place blocks at valid ghost block positions$(br2)This works in both survival and creative mode, making altar construction much faster and more accurate.

pages.title: Altar Tiers
pages.text: The diviner works with all altar tiers (1-6):$(br)$(li)$(bold)Tier 1-2:$() Basic bloodstone and rune structures$(li)$(bold)Tier 3:$() Adds glowstone with support pillars$(li)$(bold)Tier 4:$() Expanded structure with more runes$(li)$(bold)Tier 5:$() Requires dungeon metal blocks$(li)$(bold)Tier 6:$() Needs $(will)Crystallized Demon Will Blocks$()
